1.title: 201: Zuri Scrivens
1.plot: Zuri desperately needs a break but she can't afford one.

2.title: 202: Laura Freeman
2.plot: Laura's family worries she will never have the chance to see the world.

3.title: 203: Reenie Oakey
3.plot: Reenie has dedicated her life to supporting others; now her family wants to help fulfill her dream.

4.title: 204: Renato & Meleana Sagastizado
4.plot: Meleana and Renato have never been on vacation; they are sent on a relaxing trip.

5.title: 205: Ceilidh Millar
5.plot: Ceilidh has been burning the candle at both ends for a long time.

6.title: 206: Jacqueline Brooks
6.plot: Jackie's family and friends think it is time she got a vacation she missed out on so many years ago.

7.title: 207: Paul Thandi
7.plot: Paul is a single father who has dedicated his life to taking care of his daughter Jayda.

8.title: 208: Paul Mitchell
8.plot: Paul's family wants to show him how much they appreciate everything he does for them.

9.title: 209: Natasha Wilson
9.plot: Natasha's family wants to send her on a vacation of a lifetime.

10.title: 210: Melesio Cuevas
10.plot: Mel never does anything for himself; his friends and co-workers want to reward him.

11.title: 211: Kalo Belcham
11.plot: Kalo dreams of traveling, but refuses to spend money on anything but family; his loved ones want to send him on a relaxing break.

12.title: 212: Jack Fox
12.plot: Jack never takes a break from volunteering and working so his friends and family give him the vacation of his dreams.

13.title: 213: Ben Cohnstaedt
13.plot: Ben hasn't had a chance to travel, and with a new wife and baby, he can't afford to anytime soon; his family and friends make the trip of his dreams a reality.

14.title: 214: Cindy-Lea Stephenson & George Saunders
14.plot: Cindy and George are always supporting others through their business; the community is coming together to make something wonderful happen for them.

15.title: 215: Mike Langlois
15.plot: Mike's family wants to send him on a much-deserved break.

1.title: 101: Dakota Meredith
1.plot: Dakota is a young woman who, because of a disease, was often in and out of the hospital. Even though she struggles with her pain, she keeps a positive spirit.

2.title: 102: Dan and Dixie Mack
2.plot: Dan and Dixie's family was devastated when Melissa, their eldest daughter, was diagnosed with ALS. They did everything to help their daughter during her final days and, since her death, they need a fresh start.

3.title: 103: Julianna Vittorio
3.plot: Julianna Vittorio: Julianna is one of those rare people who knows that the glass is half full. She's strong and bubbly, and doesn't let anything hold her back, including her autism. She volunteers for many organizations but there is a special place in her heart for KidSafe. The KidSafe staff has come together, along with her friends and family, to celebrate and thank this incredibly generous young woman.

4.title: 104: Patti Milne
4.plot: Patti's love for her kids knows no bounds and she's given up so much for her kids. Her daughter Krista was diagnosed with Down Syndrome and she has been fighting for her daughter's right to live her life to the fullest.

5.title: 105: Curtis Swedgan
5.plot: Curtis has worked hard to be a good father, but everything changed five years ago when he was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis. However, before he is stuck in a wheelchair his family wants him to have one big family vacation.

6.title: 106: Bryan Mollet
6.plot: Bryan is a passionate street photographer who has gone through a troublesome past. However, he came through it all, and his family is ready to show him how much they all believe in his talent by sending him on vacation.

7.title: 107: Dawn Baker
7.plot: Dawn experienced hardships such as a childhood with an alcoholic father, cervical cancer, and abusive relationships. The ups are crowned by the birth of her twins, Jessica and Melissa, who want to pay back their mom for all her sacrifices.

8.title: 108: Karen Duncan
8.plot: Karen has worked tirelessly for the past 12 years, dedicating her life to kitten rescue. A decade without even a day off is starting to take its toll on her health and the volunteers have decided that she needs a break.

9.title: 109: Lauren Asperin
9.plot: Two years ago, Lauren and her partner Andy were thrilled to be married and looking forward to being parents, but then they discovered that her life, and the baby's life, was at risk from a rare blood disease.

10.title: 110: Belen Dittrich
10.plot: Belen had many hardships growing up in the Philippines and decided to move to Canada. Since leaving, Belen has made a good life for herself while continuing to financially and emotionally support her relatives back home.

11.title: 111: Jeneece Edroff
11.plot: At the age of three Jeneece was diagnosed with Neurofibromatosis, which is a debilitating disease that causes tumor growth on nerve pathways. After a dozen dangerous surgeries she has still raised millions of dollars to help others.

12.title: 112: Tim Jones
12.plot: Over the past 20 years Tim has saved countless lives, but there's one life that needs a little TLC now - his own. Working 40 hours a week as a paramedic plus 50 hours volunteering for North Shore Rescue, Tim has little downtime.

13.title: 113: Evan Pownall
13.plot: Evan & Jennifer have a dream love story but were devastated by three ectopic pregnancies & Evan's father passing away after a brief battle with cancer. Jennifer credits Evan for holding their relationship together and wants to thank him.

14.title: 114: Lindsay Gallichen
14.plot: Lindsay and her husband Jason were blessed with two boys. However during the pregnancy she was diagnosed with Psoriatic Arthritis. Through all her struggles she has been supportive to her group of girlfriends and they want to give back.

15.title: 115: Kathleen Taylor
15.plot: Kathleen is always there for friends; she raised her friend's kids as her own, she opened her home to two separate families while they were experiencing hardships, she hosted an immigrating family, and she looks after her elderly mother.

imdb.plot outline: Do you know someone who missed his or her chance to travel the world? Who, because of choices or circumstances, missed their window? Or maybe you know someone that really deserves a break, perhaps a dream vacation? One of those people that always puts others first and never takes the time to do something for him or herself. We all know of these selfless people; they've done so much good for everyone else, given up so much or given over their lives to others, and now they deserve a chance to escape and finally see some of the world. Here's your chance to give them that - this is Operation Vacation. Join Claire Newell and Karl Schmid as they meet families and friends with one wish - to surprise someone they love and admire with a fabulous vacation of a lifetime. This show isn't just about the trip, its about people having the chance to tell others just how important they are and just how much they mean to those around them. Operation Vacation is a truly heartwarming and enriching experience, not just for those that take part but for the viewer too. It's a roller-coaster journey of emotion that with each episode shows you the ups and downs of the life of one very special person.
